scripts.migrate:apply: sh -c 'if [ -z "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" ]; then echo "SUPABASE_DB_URL manquant" >&2; exit 1; fi; supabase migration up --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" --include-all'
scripts.migrate:rollback: sh -c 'if [ -z "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" ]; then echo "SUPABASE_DB_URL manquant" >&2; exit 1; fi; supabase migration down 1 --db-url "$SUPABASE_DB_URL" --include-all'
